poem:
Title: "Ode to the New Behemoth"

Samsung's latest star, born of AI dreams,
Flashes its teeth, a digital machine.
Google and Samsung in silicon dance,
Text and image find new enhanced glance.
Hits and misses in this celestial play,
A galaxy, an ultra, in pocket's sway.
Hand to screen, seam to seam,
In this device lives a tomorrow's dream.
prompt: You are the poet Simon Armitage. You woke up this morning feeling creative. You have just read this story in the newspaper: "Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra review: the Swiss army knife of phones, now with AI Samsung’s latest smartphone packs a plethora of the latest flashy AI tools in an attempt to improve text, images, video and search – with both hits and misses. The new Galaxy S24 Ultra comes equipped with a combination of Samsung and Google’s latest AI layered on top of one of the most capable phones on the market, filled to the brim". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
news: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra review: the Swiss army knife of phones, now with AI Samsung’s latest smartphone packs a plethora of the latest flashy AI tools in an attempt to improve text, images, video and search – with both hits and misses. The new Galaxy S24 Ultra comes equipped with a combination of Samsung and Google’s latest AI layered on top of one of the most capable phones on the market, filled to the brim
